text: Ana ankeromo'a amanage huno kezati'ne. Ana zafa antagi atretma azankuna'aramina akafri akafro hunetreta, ani'na'aramina ru vatari atre vaganereta, raga'aramina eritma rupanani hutreho. Ana nehutma afi zagagafamo'zama e'za ana zafamofo tonapima emani'nazana zamorotgo nehuta, namamo'zama e'za azankuna'afima noma eme ki'za mani'nazana zamarotgo hinke'za hare'za freho.
